skills.name: Blink
skills.description: Warp - Teleport to a target, stunning enemies around you.

skills.name: Domain
skills.description: Upgrade - Expands the range of your displacing skills.

skills.name: Shadow Refuge
skills.description: Buff - Briefly shield yourself in a mantle of shadows.

skills.name: Shadowrush
skills.description: Upgrade - Move quicker while clad in shadows.

skills.name: Perfect Being
skills.description: Passive - Merge with the shadows to become intangible.

skills.name: Queen of Blades
skills.description: Buff - Spinning blades periodically strike at enemies within melee range.

skills.name: Storm Crows
skills.description: Projectile - Throw a volley of randomly homing knives.

skills.name: Way of the Spider
skills.description: Passive - Enables you to inflict powerful poisonous attacks.

skills.name: Scorpion Blade
skills.description: Projectile - Knives coated in deadly poison.

skills.name: APF-20 'Maelstrom' Mk1
skills.description: Projectile - Piercing knife that emits flechettes while moving.

skills.name: Wychwind
skills.description: Projectile - Knife infused with a void spell that tears a rift field on hit throwing this knife weakens you, leaving you susceptible to damage.

skills.name: Lethal Incision
skills.description: Buff - Concentrate the power of your poisonous blades.

skills.name: Broadside
skills.description: Projectile - Plants a mechanical device that fires a barrage of knives.

skills.name: Void Gazer
skills.description: Upgrade - Perceive the void bestowing you with power other than weakness.

skills.name: Noctule
skills.description: Attack - Conjures bats which burst away on impact.

skills.name: Way of the Gryphon
skills.description: Passive - Enables you to inflict powerful shocking attacks.

skills.name: Shadow Dancer
skills.description: Passive - Enhances your combat prowess while using a claw.

skills.name: Batstrike
skills.description: Attack - Charge to unleash various finishers.

skills.name: Summon Familiars
skills.description: Upgrade - Surprise your enemies with deadly bat summons.

skills.name: Anathema
skills.description: Buff - Neutralizes enemy elemental damage and enhances your own.

skills.name: Winged Calamity
skills.description: Upgrade - Familiars become exceptional in combat .

skills.name: Vampiric Strike
skills.description: Upgrade - Unleash a devastating melee blow while inspired by the night.

skills.name: Crucify
skills.description: Attack - Impales the enemy with homing spikes.

skills.name: Way of the Phoenix
skills.description: Passive - Enables you to inflict powerful fiery attacks.

skills.name: Laserblade
skills.description: Passive - Augments your offense and defense while wielding a naginata.

skills.name: Barrier Strike
skills.description: Attack - Create a circle of blades that repel enemies.

skills.name: Backstab
skills.description: Attack - Attacks the enemy's weak spot with enhanced damage.

skills.name: Hades Gate
skills.description: Warp Strike - Teleport into a corpse, heavily damaging nearby enemies.

skills.name: Execution
skills.description: Upgrade - Adds magic damage to Broadside after backstabbing.

skills.name: Momentum
skills.description: Upgrade - Increases proficiency by reducing the cooldown.

skills.name: Subterfuge
skills.description: Passive - Unlocks the path to the obscure arts of the traps artificer.

skills.name: Shockwave Trap
skills.description: Trap - Detonates into a chatic nova near enemies.

skills.name: Catalyst Trap
skills.description: Trap - Activates near enemeis slowing them, empowers your other traps.

skills.name: Incineration Trap
skills.description: Trap - Place a device which burns all nearby enemies.

skills.name: Negative Charge
skills.description: Upgrade - Boosts the piercing potential of the lightning discharges.

skills.name: Enhanced Contraption
skills.description: Upgrade - Further weakens enemies inside the trap.

skills.name: Artifice Mastery
skills.description: Passive - Proficiency in the craft imparts advanced field survival techniques.

skills.name: Forger's Hegemony
skills.description: Passive - Regenerate life after being struck by weapon damage.

skills.name: Shuriken Flurry
skills.description: Spell - Expels a set of shurikens psychically driving them at nearby foes.

skills.name: Pinnacle
skills.description: Buff - The assassin forgoes combat strength for mental prowess.

skills.name: Psionic Scream
skills.description: Spell - Mind Shockwave that forces nearby enemies to flee.

skills.name: Cognition
skills.description: Passive - Enhances your psionic capabilities.

skills.name: Mind Ripple
skills.description: Spell - Aggreate of psionic forces able to bend both space and mind.

skills.name: Psionic Storm
skills.description: Spell - Creates a tempest of mental energy at the target point.

skills.name: Energize
skills.description: Upgrade - Heal yourself with every cast above 10% mana.

skills.name: Meditation
skills.description: Passive - Increases your maximum mana and mana regeneration.

skills.name: Purity
skills.description: Passive - Protects you against poison damage and curses.

skills.name: Melee Devotion
skills.description: Passive - A melee exclusive layer of damage protection.

skills.name: Freedom
skills.description: Passive - Increases defensive speeds and reduces chilled duration.

skills.name: Tenacity
skills.description: Passive - Increases physical resistance.

skills.name: Endurance
skills.description: Passive - Increases your maximum life.

skills.name: Continuity
skills.description: Passive - Increases the duration of your buff/debuff skills.

skills.name: Specialization
skills.description: Passive - Increases the skill cap of your activate [Non-Ultimate] Abilities.

skills.name: Chemistry
skills.description: Passive - Increases potion effectiveness compared to other sustain.

skills.name: Prismatic Cloak
skills.description: Passive - Reduces incoming elemental and magical damage.

skills.name: Vampiric Icon
skills.description: Spell - Trace a deadly female glyph with arcane flames.

skills.name: Doom
skills.description: Curse - Weaken the body and mind of your foes.

skills.name: Way of the Raven
skills.description: Passive - Enables you to inflict powerful cold attacks.

skills.name: Beacon
skills.description: Buff - Periodically detonates a devastating trap nearby.

skills.name: Paragon of Fate
skills.description: Passive - High level bonuses tied to Heroic Library of Fate progression.

skills.name: Paragon of Sanctity
skills.description: Passive - High level bonuses tied to Heroic Duncraig progression.
